original: Set The Record Straight
string: 澄清事实

original: By pure luck I ran into Katria's old apprentice, Taron Dreth and his bodyguards. Immediately, he saw the Aetherium artifact and demanded to know where I found it. Instead of telling him to get lost, I told him the truth, that I'd made it with Katria's help. That set him off, he tried to kill me... big mistake, the dispicable Dumner and his men died. He carried a note, which might be an interesting read...
string: 纯粹是运气使然，我碰到了卡提雅的老徒弟泰荣·德莱瑟和他的保镖。他立刻看到了我身上的神光水晶神器，问我在哪里找到的。我没有叫他滚蛋，而是告诉了他真相，我是在卡提雅的帮助下成功的。这让他很生气，他想杀了我...他真是犯了大错，卑鄙的暗精灵和他的手下都死了。他带着一张纸条，内容可能会很有趣。

original: The note Dreth carried told him he was being hunted... why doesn't that surprise me? Apparantly Dreth was working with the Thalmor too. Probably a spy... but now a dead one, good riddance. Who are these Inquistors, and why were they hunting Katria too? She's now avenged for this dirt bag's betrayal... and can finally, truly rest in peace. I really liked her a lot, it's a shame she's gone. Too bad being Dragonborn doesn't come with a single wish being granted. Because, if ever I had a wish... it'd surely be to have Katria alive again. Time to 'set the record straight' and find a publisher, or print shop to commission an erratum. Hmm... that's a service that only a captitol city would offer... well, hopefully Solitude has one.
string: 德莱瑟随身携带的纸条告诉我有人在追捕他。为什么我一点都不惊讶?显然德莱瑟也在和梭默一起工作。他可能是个间谍…...但现在他已经是一具尸体，很好的结局。这些审判者是谁，他们为什么也在追捕卡提雅?她已经报了这个混蛋的背叛之仇...现在她终于可以安息了。我真的很喜欢她，可惜她逝去了。遗憾的是，龙裔没有一个愿望可以实现。因为，如果我曾经有过想要实现的一个愿望...那一定是让卡提雅复活。是时候“纠正错误”了，找个出版商或印刷厂做个勘误。嗯...这是只有首府城市才能提供的服务...好吧，希望独孤城会有一个。

original: I found the Gwylim Annex print shop in Solitude. The Master Printer empathized on hearing Katria's story, regarding Dreth's betrayal and her being an unrestful ghost. I showed him the artifact which provided the strongest evidence for truth. But for proper credit and notoriety he needs Katria's surname and a steep commission of 500 septims. Unfortunately she never mentioned it. He then suggested I ask around her home city, which she didn't mention either. He did mention Halath here is also a courier, that gives me an idea. I should have Halath post notes on message boards requesting the information for a reward of 200 Septims. That might draw attention.
string: 我在独孤城找到了格威里姆大学分部的印刷店。印刷师在听到卡提雅的故事后产生了情感共鸣，意识到了德莱瑟的背叛和她是一个无法安息的鬼魂。我给他看了那个为真相提供了最有力证据的神器。但为了获得适当的信誉和名声，他需要卡提雅的姓氏和500赛普汀的高额佣金。不幸的是，她从未提起过这件事。然后他建议我去她的家乡转转，她也没提到这个。他在这里提到哈拉斯也是个信使，这让我有了个想法。我应该让哈拉斯在留言板上发布信息悬赏200赛普汀。这可能会引起人们的注意。

original: Halath, the Journeyman Printer at Gwylim Annex said, passing near Arkngthamz, he saw a distant figure that looked like a knight of Stendarr, but oddly wearing dark colors. He saw the knight place a corpse on a spare horse. Being curious, he followed long enough to discover the knight was heading toward the mountain pass to High Rock.  Coincidence maybe... could that have been Katria's corpse? If so, why? And if not, I think I'll find a good place to bury her, I should've done it before now. Well, better late than never. Katria's surname issue can wait. Before I get all apprehensive about it I should verify whether or not her corpse was taken.
string: 格威里姆大学分部的印刷工哈拉斯说，当他经过阿肯撒兹附近时，他看到远处有一个人，看起来像是斯坦达尔的圣骑士，但奇怪的是，他穿着深色的衣服。他看见骑士把一具尸体放在一匹备用的马上。出于好奇，他跟着走了很长时间，发现骑士正朝着通往高岩省的山口走去。这是个巧合,但也许…...那具尸体会是卡提雅吗?如果是，为什么会是她?如果不是，我想我会找个好地方埋葬她，我早该这么做的。迟做总比不做好。卡提雅的姓氏问题可以等等再说。在我真的担心之前，我应该核实一下她的尸体是否被带走了。

original: Noooo! Her body isn't here. Ok, now I'm angry and apprehensive. But why... why do I care, it's just another corpse like any other... or is it? Dammit! Ghost or not, perhaps I liked her more than I should have. So, who is this peculiar dark knight fellow and why did he take Katria's corpse over the mountains and into High Rock? Something doesn't add up here. The only clue I have is the note I found on Dreth, it implies Ondolemar knew her. Before I go traipsing off to High Rock, I should ask him exactally how he knew of her, or why? It's time to visit Understone Keep in Markarth.
string: 不!她的尸体不在这里。好吧，现在我又生气又担心了。但是为什么...我为什么在乎，这只是一具和其他尸体一样的尸体...是吗?该死的!不管是不是鬼魂，也许我太喜欢她了。那么，这个奇怪的黑暗骑士是谁?他为什么带着卡特莉亚的尸体翻山越岭进入高岩省?有些地方不太对劲。我唯一的线索是我在德莱瑟那里找到的那张纸条，它表明昂多勒马认识她。在我去高岩省之前，我应该问问他到底是怎么认识她的，或者为什么认识?是时候去拜访马卡斯的石下要塞了。

original: I found Ondolemar, the top dog Thalmor of Justiciars in Skyrim. Surprisingly, the arrogant Altmer actually seemed amicable. Curious, perhaps getting crushed by an Inquisitor had something to do with his current temperament? He knew Katria too well, and that she lived in Markarth. Now I know her home city. He said the Thalmor are scheduling time to look for her home, to search it for clues to verify she is missing... which I find unsettling. I really need her last name now, then I could beat them to it, and find it first. He said that an Inquisitor casually walked away from combat wounded and entered the ruins. Hopefully I can persuade this Inquisitor to just talk. I need answers, if I can find him. Ondolemar said Calcelmo, at the excavation entrance, has the key I need to enter Nchuand-Zel.
string: 我找到了昂多勒马，天际中梭默审判官的老大。令人惊讶的是，这个傲慢的混蛋实际上看起来很友好。奇怪的是，也许被审判者的碾压和他现在的性情有关?他太了解卡提雅了，他知道她住在马卡斯。现在我知道她的家在哪了。他说梭默正在安排时间去搜查她的家，寻找线索来证实她失踪了…...这让我感到不安。我现在就得知道她姓什么，这样我就能抢在他们之前找到她。他说，一名审判者受伤后若无其事地离开了战场，走进了废墟。希望我能说服审判者开口。我需要答案，如果我能找到他的话。昂多勒马说，卡塞莫在挖掘入口处，有我需要的进入楚安德-泽尔的钥匙。

original: I found the Inquisitor dead... with a ton of dead Falmer around him. This guy must have been a beast of a warrior, probably why Ondolemar said these Inquisitors fight like Daedroth. He put up a good fight even while being wounded from his encounter with Ondolemar and the Thalmor. Hmm... the Inquisitor carried two messages, a letter and a note. The letter appears more formal, perhaps more important of the two.
string: 我发现审判者已经死了……周围有一堆死去的伐莫这家伙一定是个凶猛的战士，也许这就是为什么昂多勒马说这些审判者会像迪德拉一样战斗。尽管他在与昂多勒马和梭默的战斗中受伤了，但他还是顽强地战斗了一场。嗯...审判者带来了两个消息，一封信和一张便条。这封信看起来更正式，也许在这两封信中更重要一点。

original: The letter is from Katria's aunt, Kara Kingsley. She found a copy of Aetherium Wars locally, but knew Katria was writing that book, and it remained unpublished. She had no doubt it was stolen prior to publishing. It still maintained Katria's writing style and vernacular. She had't heard from Katria in months. Fearing the worse, Kara hired a couple of these Inquisitors to find out what has become of her niece. Ok, now I know Katria's last name, plus I've the 500 septims now thanks to the Inquisitor. The note is from another Inquisitor named Warren, writing to an Inquisitor Belog, presumably this corpse, telling him of Kara's letter. It's time to return to Gwylim Annex.
string: 这封信是卡提雅的阿姨卡拉·金斯利写的。她在当地找到了一本《神光水晶之战》的副本，但她知道卡提雅正在写那本书，所以这本书一直没有出版。她确信这本书在出版前就被偷了。它仍然保持着卡提雅的写作风格和方言。她已经好几个月没有卡提雅的消息了。由于担心情况会变得更糟，卡拉雇了几个审判者来调查她侄女的情况。好了，现在我知道卡提雅的姓了，而且多亏了审判者，我现在有了500个赛普汀。这封信是另一位名叫沃伦的宗教裁判官写给贝洛格的，可能是他就是这具尸体，是告诉他卡拉情况的信。现在是时候回到格威里姆大学分部了。

original: Garulf filled me in on details of the Order, the Inquisitors of Candor. Talk about your zealots and fanatics. Wow... these guys take the cake and eat it too. Garulf's advice to steer clear of these guys sounds prudent enough, should I ever meet one that's still breathing. After all they are suppose to be the good guys, but with Garulf's description it's awefully hard to tell. I surely don't want to be their enemy, not when they could make for powerful allies instead. Now to find Katria's home in Markarth hopefully before the Thalmor do. There may yet be some more information left laying around in there that Katria would not want the Thalmor to have.
string: 加鲁夫告诉了我关于教团的细节，关于坎多的审判者的细节。谈到了关于狂热分子以及宗教。以及如果我遇到一个还活着的家伙，加鲁夫给的建议听起来很小心谨慎。毕竟他们应该是好人，但从加鲁夫的描述中很难判断。我当然不想成为他们的敌人，尤其是当他们可以成为强大的盟友的时候。现在去找卡提雅在马卡斯的家，希望我能赶在梭默之前。可能还会有更多的信息留在那里，而这些信息是卡提雅不想让梭默知道的。

original: I found her house... now to find the key to it. I know the Thalmor would look in, or under, every basket, turn over every rock, look under every rug, and look at every ledge until they found it. Surely there has to be a spare key hidden here somewhere easy to reach, somewhere close. Where would Katria put it? I hope the Thalmor hasn't already beaten me to it. If they did, then there wouldn't be a key to find. Stay positive, I shouldn't think like that until after searching for it.
string: 我找到了她的房子...现在去找那该死的钥匙让我进去!我知道梭默会在附近的每一个篮子里面或下面找，翻遍每一块石头，翻遍每一块地毯，翻遍每一块壁架，直到找到为止。肯定有一把备用钥匙藏在附近某个容易拿到的地方。卡提雅会把它放在哪里?不，万一梭默人比我先下手呢。那样就找不到钥匙了。我不能那样想，除非我试着去寻找它。

original: While it worked in my favor, I'm not sure hiding the key in a basket in plain site was the best choice. Ondolemar's Thalmor idiots would've easily found it as well. Now that I have the key, I need to look around before Ondolemar's Thalmor get here and put their grubby hands on everything. It's time to have a look around Katria's house.
string: 我找到了金斯利家。但找到钥匙完全是另一回事。虽然它对我来说是好事，但我不确定在前门的篮子里放一个备用的钥匙是不是一个好主意。梭默也会发现的。这里看起来似乎没有被任何东西被打扰过，从这些厚厚的蜘蛛网来看，离开的时间太长了。卡提雅的藏书可真够丰富的。真是个学者。现在我要转转这个地方。我很高兴它又小又古雅。

original: Entering the Kingsley House, numerous cobwebs indicated I'd arrived before Ondolemar's crew. The interior remained undisturbed, cloaked in a blanket of intricate cobwebs that hinted at a year or more of neglect. My goal now was to find anything of interest to Ondolemar's crew and take it before they did. Katria's house is quite intriguing, and I couldn't help but wonder about its history. Every dust-covered corner and neglected nook and cranny only added to the mysterious aura surrounding them, and that which is... the Kingsley House.
string: 我在卡提雅的卧室梳妆台上发现了她阿姨卡拉的一封信。也许是她的最后一封信。我应该读一读，看看里面是否有什么东西可以用来破坏梭默的名声，或者更糟...用里面的休息来对付她的卡拉阿姨

original: I found a letter in Katria's bedroom dresser from her aunt Kara. Her last letter perhaps. I should read it to see if it contains anything the Thalmor could use to ruin her reputation, or worse... use what's in it against her aunt Kara. Even though, according to the letter I found on Belog, the dead Inquisitor, she lives in the region of High Rock, I'm not sure how far reaching the Thalmor's influence goes, but I don't want to take any chances.
string: 很高兴我找到了来自卡提雅阿姨卡拉的信。梭默会用它来陷害这个家族。显然，卡提雅的父亲乌特雷德曾在乌弗瑞克的旗帜下与先祖神州及其走狗帝国作战。我不会让梭默玷污我朋友的家族名声。最好清除所有房间里任何看起来不寻常的东西。

original: I'm glad I found the letter from Katria's aunt Kara, she mentioned a concealed Talos shrine somewhere in the house. Sadly, she also revealed that Kaetlynn, Katria's mother, drank herself into oblivion with separation anixiety and loneliness of living without her husband, Uhtred, Katria's father. She also states that Uhtred, had fought under Ulfric's banner against the Dominion and the Imperials. The Thalmor would use all of this information to incriminate them all. I won't allow that, the Thalmor wont sully my friend's family name. I need to locate that shrine, and once found, if neccessary, I'll secure it somehow. First, I'd better clear all the rooms of any evidence Ondolemar and his Thalmor could use.
string: 在卡提雅的卧室里，有一扇门通向一条通往浴室的短走廊，但另一条走廊由于某种原因被堵上了墙。在浴室里，浴室井底部的一个开关降低了那道墙，挡住了另一条隐藏的短走廊。它揭示了另一扇锁着的门，需要另一把钥匙。该死，这些古老而沉重的门没有钥匙是打不开的。如果我先拿到钥匙的话，梭默就永远也进不去了。它肯定就在这附近藏在显眼的地方-我一定是错过了。哪里是我唯一没有好好搜索的地方……嗯…“好吧”…就像在浴室井底一样?

original: I believe I've found all the documents that could incriminate Katria's family name. Now I just need to find that shrine Katria's aunt Kara spoke of, to see if there is anything I can do to ensure it remains hidden from the Thalmor.
string: 很好...我终于找到了另一把钥匙。我希望它能匹配那扇隐藏的门，这样我就能看到它通向哪里。

original: Down the steps from the living room tavern area I found a hallway leading to a locked door. At the bottom of the steps, I noticed the left wall opposite a Dwemer light, which seemed to be blocking an intersection, possibly leading to the temple or shrine. I found a key in Katria's bedroom that was inscribed "Bathhouse," and it fit the locked door at the end of the hallway. When I opened the door, I discovered a large room with an enormous, deep, empty well. I realized it must be the one mentioned in the receipt of purchase for the house, as well as one of Kaetlynn's letters. Now, my next step is to locate and close the drain valve so that I can reach the bottom and use the other valve. There must be a hidden passage.
string: 在使用钥匙后，我遇到了乌特雷德·本布罗提的鬼魂，卡提雅的父亲。他告诉我卡提雅被她的阿姨卡拉复活了!卡提雅家的假墙后面藏着塔洛斯神龛。幸好我有房子的钥匙，我可不想让梭默把卡提雅贴上异端的标签，尽管在马卡斯这里就有一个塔洛斯神龛，而且我没有看到任何梭默在守卫它……或者摧毁它。但还是没必要玷污金斯利家的名声。我完成了...我已经把所有可疑的，或不可疑的东西，都带走了。没有钥匙他们是进不来的，我还是拿着钥匙吧。乌特雷德说卡提雅还活着，现在住在银血旅馆。卡提雅现在活着!这应该是一件好事...我得去看看她!

original: Great! With the Pump Station key in hand, I'm one step closer. Now to find that valve to close the drain and fill the well. A dwemer lift makes sense as a Pump Station at a higher level would more than likely use gravity to be more efficient.
string: 太好了！有了泵站钥匙，离目标又近一步。现在只要找到关闭排水管的阀门，水井就能蓄水。锻莫升降梯作为高位泵站，很可能是利用重力提高效率的。

original: With the well's drain closed it should fill. Now I can swim to the bottom of the well to use the other valve and find out what it does.
string: 关闭井底排水管后水位应该会上升。现在我可以潜到井底操作另一个阀门，看看有什么效果。

original: Using the valve at the bottom of the well made the sound of heavy stone moving against stone. Must have been pretty loud, as I could hear under water. Time to check the hallway intersection that's down the steps from the Livingroom Tavern. 'Kaetlynn's Tavern' named after Katria's Mother, going by the letters I found.
string: 转动井底阀门时，我听见水下传来巨石摩擦的轰鸣。台阶下的起居室酒馆旁有条走廊岔路，该去检查了——"凯特琳的酒馆"，根据我找到的信件，这是以卡提雅母亲命名的。

original: Yet another locked door... great. These ancient heavy doors can't be opened without a key. Well, the good thing is... if I find the key first... the Thalmor will never get in. Like the house key in the basket, this key too has to be around here, hidden in plain sight no doubt, where I must have already missed it. Where's the only place I that I didn't search well... hmm... 'well'... as in the bottom of the bath well? Time for another swim.
string: 又是一道上锁的门...真棒。这些古老的厚重门扉没有钥匙根本打不开。不过往好处想...只要我先找到钥匙...梭默就永远进不来。就像藏在篮子里的家门钥匙一样，这把钥匙肯定也藏在显眼的地方，只是我之前没注意到。唯一没仔细找过的地方是...嗯..."井"...指的是浴池井底？该再潜一次水了。

original: Nice... I finally found another key. I hope its fits that hidden door so that I can see where it leads.
string: 很好...终于又找到一把钥匙。希望它能打开那扇暗门，让我看看后面藏着什么。

original: After using the shrine key I was confronted by the ghost of Uhtred Beinbroti, Katria's father. He told me Katria has been resurrected by her aunt Kara! Hidden behind the fake wall in Katria's house is a Talos shrine. Damn good thing I have the house key, I wouldn't want the Thalmor to label Katria as a heretic, even though there's a Talos Shrine right here in Markarth, and I don't see any Thalmor guarding it... or destroying it. Still no need to tarnish the Kingsley reputation. I'm done here... I've secured everything suspicious, or not, to the Thalmor. Their not getting in here without the key, which I think I'll hold on to. Uhtred said Katria is alive and well currently at the Silver-Blood Inn. Katria Alive! This should be a treat... I've got to go see her!
string: 使用祭坛钥匙后，我遇到了卡提雅的父亲乌特雷德·班布罗提的幽灵。他告诉我卡提雅被她的姑姑卡拉复活了！卡提雅家假墙后面藏着个塔洛斯祭坛。幸好我拿着家门钥匙，可不想让梭默给卡提雅扣上异教徒的罪名——尽管马卡斯城里明明就有塔洛斯祭坛，也没见梭默派人看守...或者捣毁它。但毕竟没必要玷污金斯莱家的名声。这里的事办完了...我把所有可疑的（或不算可疑的）东西都藏好了，梭默绝对进不来——只要钥匙还在我手里。乌特雷德说卡提雅现在活得很好，就在银血客栈。卡提雅复活了！这可得去看看...我这就去找她！
